description: This package will silently install WinPE add-on for the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit to the default location with winpe features.
displayName: WinPE add-on for the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit
summary: The Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) is a collection of tools that you can use to customize, assess, and deploy Windows operating systems to new computers. Installs WinPE ONLY!
author: Microsoft
